pronunciation.pinyin: jǐ suǒ bù yù , wù shī yú rén
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ji3 suo3 bu4 yu4 , wu4 shi1 yu2 ren2

meanings.value: What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)
Do as you would be done by.
Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
